fields.label: Link Label
fields.name: text
fields.description: The text this link will be displayed as.

fields.label: Link URL
fields.name: url
fields.description: The page this link will direct to. For internal links, exclude your domain name. For external links, paste in full. Can be blank if dropdown.

fields.label: Link Tab
fields.name: location
fields.description: Should this link open in the current tab or a new tab?

fields.label: Dropdown Links
fields.name: children
fields.description: Adding additional links to this entry will make it a dropdown.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the page. This is used to display the title in the CMS

fields.label: Meta Title
fields.name: meta_title
fields.description: The meta title for the page. This is used for the page name displayed in your tab and for SEO purposes.

fields.label: Meta Description
fields.name: meta_desc
fields.description: The meta description for the page. This is used for SEO purposes.

defaultItem.body: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Donec odio. Quisque volutpat mattis eros. Nullam malesuada erat ut turpis. Suspendisse urna nibh, viverra non, semper suscipit, posuere a, pede.
